name: RecipeRemix
0:
”Alexa, ask recipe remix to play”
”Alexa, ask recipe remix to pause”
”Alexa, ask recipe remix for ingredients”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recipe remix
des:
Each episode is a step by step audio guide to cooking a great meal. But your chef is an artist playing their latest songs. The episode lasts the exact time it takes to prep ingredients, cook and plate your meal.

Cook Meatloaf and Ritz Crackers together with exciting new Artist Spencer Ludwig. Spencer will play his new tunes including his hit Diggy, tell you his story his story and everything you need to know to create this yummy meatloaf. 

Try it now, you control the episode with your voice, leaving your hands free to chop, slice, dice and dance. And you will dance to Spencer’s jams.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
